    • Constructor Detail

      • TheoreticalFigure

        public TheoreticalFigure(double nx,
                         double ny,
                         TheoreticalFigure.ColliderTypes type)
        Creates a new rectangle object in the game, with width, height, x and y. Has easy rendering capabilities (render()) and collision detection (isColliding()).
        Parameters:
        nx - X position of object by default.
        ny - Y position of object by default.
        type - The Collider Type, from ColliderTypes Enumerator

      • TheoreticalFigure

        public TheoreticalFigure(double nx,
                         double ny,
                         int nwidth,
                         int nheight,
                         TheoreticalFigure.ColliderTypes type)
        Creates a new rectangle object in the game, with width, height, x and y. Has easy rendering capabilities (render()) and collision detection (isColliding()).
        Parameters:
        nx - X position of object by default.
        ny - Y position of object by default.
        nwidth - Width of the object by default.
        nheight - Height of the object by default.
        type - The Collider Type, from ColliderTypes Enumerator
